GameEngineService
 
GameExceptionHandler
Handles in-game exceptions GameOverException, GameFaultyMoveException, to produce appropriate response messages.
GameFaultyMoveException
Exception that is thrown when a player tries to purchase a cell that can't be purchased.
GameInteractionDTO
DTO object representing the user's move in a game.
GameManagementException
Exception that is thrown when a user is not authorized to interact with the requested game, or the interaction can't be conducted for another reason such as a game with the same name existing while creating a new game.
GameManagerService
 
GameOverException
Exception that is thrown when one of the players of a game goes bankrupt.
